data.name: Sample - Micro Focus Service Manager - 1.3.1
data.description: Micro Focus service manager connector helps you to create incident, update incident, list incidents, get incident, get device list and get device

workflows.description: Creates a new incident on the Micro Focus Service Manager server, based on the input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Create Incident

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Create Incident

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of incidents from the Micro Focus Service Manager server, based on the query and other input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Incident List

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Get Incident List

workflows.description: Retrieves details about a specific incident from the Micro Focus Service Manager server, based on the incident ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Incident

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Get Incident

workflows.description: Updates an existing incident on the Micro Focus Service Manager server, based on the input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Update Incident

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Update Incident

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of devices from the Micro Focus Service Manager server, based on the query and other input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Device List

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Get Device List

workflows.description: Retrieves details about a specific device from the Micro Focus Service Manager server, based on the configuration item you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Device

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Get Device

workflows.description: Creates a new change request on the Service Manager server, based on the title, category, primary affected service, and other input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Create Change

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Create Change

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all change requests or specific change requests from the Service Manager server, based on the query and other input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Change List

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Get Change List

workflows.description: Retrieves details for a specific change request from the Service Manager server, based on the change request ID you have specified
workflows.name: Get Change Request

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Get Change Request

workflows.description: Updates an existing change for closure in Service Manager based on the change ID, closure code, phase, and other input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Update Change

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Update Change

workflows.description: Creates a new RF - Request Fulfillment Ticket on the MFSM/HPSM Manager server, based on the title, description, category, priority, etc., and other input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Create RF - Request Fulfillment Ticket

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Create RF - Request Fulfillment Ticket

routes.name: Start-> Create RF - Request Fulfillment Ticket

workflows.description: Retrieves details for a specific RF-Request Fulfillment Ticket from the MFSM/HPSM server, based on the RF ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Get RF - Request Fulfillment Ticket

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Get RF - Request Fulfillment Ticket

routes.name: Start-> Get RF - Request Fulfillment Ticket

workflows.description: Updates an existing RF-Request Fulfillment Ticket to upload (add) an attachment to that RF in Service Manager based on the RF ID, attachment name, and message body you have specified.
workflows.name: Update RF - Request Fulfillment Ticket for an attachment

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Update RF - Request Fulfillment Ticket for an attachment

steps.name: Update RF - Request Fulfillment Ticket for an attachment

arguments.name: Micro Focus Service Manager
arguments.operationTitle: Update RF - Request Fulfillment Ticket for an attachment

routes.name: Start-> Update RF - Request Fulfillment Ticket for an attachment

workflows.description: Request on the Resource Attachment Collection of an incident identified by incident number.
workflows.name: Retrieve Attachment Information

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Retrieve Attachment Information

workflows.description: Download an attachment associated with an incident identified by attachment number and incident number.
workflows.name: Download Attachment

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Download Attachment

workflows.description: Delete an attachment associated with an incident identified by attachment number and incident number.
workflows.name: Delete Attachment

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Delete Attachment
